subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Tuesday’s 16th stage measures just 157 kilometers (97.5 miles) in length, but it includes 3,350 meters (11,000 feet) of climbing with barely a flat spot on it.
snippet: Tuesday’s 16th stage measures just 157 kilometers (97.5 miles) in length, but it includes 3,350 meters (11,000 feet) of climbing with barely a flat spot on it.
